verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And never faint Oh pray full on and fast Rough though the untrod way Straight on and last And never faint Though those may rave For rest The goal not thee is first Pray on thou blest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And never faint Though strain May weigh thee down Pray on If thou wouldst fain Have on the crown And never faint The end thou mayest not view When bound let nought thee bend Press on anew{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And never faint Thy charge to God Given o'er Pray on Thy tent enlarge Enrich thy store And never faint Pray on each day With care Strive for Till thou hast won The answered prayer{/lang-eng}
